titleStmt.title: A curious collection of painting [sic], of the most famous, antient and modern masters in Europe viz. Tintoret ... Wyck with many more great masters, will be exposed to sale by auction, on Wednesday, the 24th. of this instant September, at the house of Mr. Smith Gent. next Bedford-Gate in York-street, Covent-Garden, and are to be seen this Saturday, and Monday, and Tuesday following. Likewise there will be large looking-glasses in rich frames, and rich tea-tables exposed to sale. The sale begins precisely half and hour after two. Catalogues may be had at the place of sale, and to be seen at the principal coffee-houses.

A curious collection of painting [sic], of the most famous, antient and modern masters in Europe viz. Tintoret ... Wyck with many more great masters, will be exposed to sale by auction, on Wednesday, the 24th. of this instant September, at the house of Mr. Smith Gent. next Bedford-Gate in York-street, Covent-Garden, and are to be seen this Saturday, and Monday, and Tuesday following. Likewise there will be large looking-glasses in rich frames, and rich tea-tables exposed to sale. The sale begins precisely half and hour after two. Catalogues may be had at the place of sale, and to be seen at the principal coffee-houses.

notesStmt.note: B4r is misnumbered 13. It contains a list of 21 paintings with caption title "An appendix to the paintings". B3r is also numbered 13, and also contains an appendix, but lists only 7 paintings. B4 is probably intended to cancel B3, but both are present in the only known copy, and are included in the pagination above.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
